text: Sweta Shervegar is an Indian sailor. She won the silver medal at 2018 Asian Games in women's 49er event, along with Varsha Gautham. ==References== Category:Indian female sailors (sport) Category:Living people Category:Asian Games medalists in sailing Category:Sailors at the 2018 Asian Games Category:1990 births Category:Asian Games silver medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Sweta Shervegar
